isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - GENERAL INFORMATION - 1992-1993 - TROUBLESHOOTING - SERVICE TOOLS

svcproc.title: SERVICE TOOLS
svcproc.para: The purpose of the data link connector is to allow an easy access point for electronic service tools.
The Pro Link 9000 Electronic Service Tool has a specific cartridge for the various engines.
Each cartridge has a manual that includes operation instructions and engine codes.

Cummins, Caterpillar and Detroit Diesel also have service tools and literature available to assist in troubleshooting their particular engines in addition to the information that is included with the vehicle information package.
